item.title: True crime documentary serial „Редакција“
item.description: Produced by: Investigative Reporting Lab „Redakcija“ is a documentary series that follows the high level of corruption and crime in the Republic of Macedonia. The episodes follow the work of brave and hopeful journalists who cover crime stories. Kokos Produkcija actively participates in the production stage (filming) of Редакција. Season 1: Заговор против воздухот Изгубени во премерот Невозможна одбрана Титаник од серава Season 2: On Going

item.title: Theatre & Integration
item.description: Documentary by SCS Centar Jadro. Short documentary „Theatre & Integration“ that follows the work of the independent cultural centre „КСП Центар - Јадро“ during the covid pandemy. Director and Camera: Kristijan Karadzovski Editor: Andrej Risteski Coproduction between Kokos Produkcija & КСП Центар - Јадро
